original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3356)@</color>對前方快速施展兩次攻擊，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3356)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3356)@</color> quickly launch two attacks on the front, with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3356 )@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage to the enemy.
